item.title: The Heart Has It's Own Brain - and it has more Control than you think
item.description:
The Heart Has It's Own Brain - and it has more Control than you think

I recently watched an interview with the incredible Gregg Braden about the 6 Perennial Questions, False Assumptions and New Discoveries. The whole interview itself is fascinating and a real joy to listen to however it was the final 15 minutes that had me on the edge of my seat.

item.title: Any Decision You Make is the Right Decision
item.description:
Any Decision You Make is the Right Decision

I recently saw an interview with Oprah where she stresses that in life there are no failures, your life is bigger than any one moment. No matter what choices you make in life whether it's a career move, entering into a relationship, it all points you to the same place.
